SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW_NUMBER , M_ID , M_NICKNAME , M_WARNING_NO , MB_REASON , TO_CHAR(MB_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MB_START_DATE , TO_CHAR(MB_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MB_END_DATE FROM MEMBER JOIN MEMBERBAN ON (M_UNO = MB_NO) WHERE M_ADMIN_YN = 'N' AND M_BAN_STATUS = 'Y' AND M_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW_NUMBER , M_NAME , M_ID , M_NICKNAME , M_REASON , TO_CHAR(M_LEAVE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS M_LEAVE_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ADMIN_YN = 'N' AND M_STATUS = 'N'
